attributes.contentHtml: I think specs are some what of an indicator. For example if you want to know if a host is using oracle free tier for there mc servers, you can use ptero VM or something and if the specs are like 24 gb ram 200 gb SSD and 4 core CPU then its most likely the free tier vps. Same with most other resellers. Most big real hosts (ovh, was, azure, digital ocean)give u like 100 or 200 dollar of credits which is enough to buy a server with 30 gb ram.

attributes.title: Easy Way To Know A Scam Hosting
